name: Gods of Egypt: A Divine Vision: Creating A Cinematic Action Fantasy
detailed_description: Explore both the story origins of Gods Of Egypt as the filmmakers drew inspiration from Egyptian myths to conceive a fresh and engaging tale, as well as its intricate design aesthetic with Production Designer Owen Patterson.
